text-align: center;\">\n<iframe width=\"320\" height=\"266\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Yw5mrSbszeE/0.jpg\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Yw5mrSbszeE?feature=player_embedded\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EjRzeQmxVkk/WHTQRz_63JI/AAAAAAABQPA/ZT2QKNVbH8gpTsMHTWcn5t6iqxyBm5mWACLcB/s1600/2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EjRzeQmxVkk/WHTQRz_63JI/AAAAAAABQPA/ZT2QKNVbH8gpTsMHTWcn5t6iqxyBm5mWACLcB/s640/2.jpg\" width=\"288\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "275", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5394579835032131665/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8032019779037385394", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-01-07T13:39:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-01-12T01:16:37+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDg0MTYzOTk3MjIzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/01/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_7.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8032019779037385394", "title": "Ethical NLP, Neuro-Linguistic Programming sans covert manipulation and predatory deception, Part 4 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 3 , BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEY , ALL YOU MALE PRANIS\n&nbsp;WHO JERK OFF\u2014 &nbsp;HAJAAAAR HELP IS AT HAND.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP HAS THE POWERFUL\nSWISH TECHNIQUE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; The swish is a powerful technique \u2013 based\nlike a lot of NLP on behavioural psychology \u2013 for making lasting changes in\nhabits and behaviours. The swish pattern is designed to change a problematic\nbehaviour that\u2019s driven by a trigger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea behind the\nswish is to attach a self image to the trigger so that every time the trigger\nis activated, you see a new way of behaving and you change your behaviour\neffortlessly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Say that you bite your\nnails. The swish enables you to use a picture of the trigger \u2013 such as seeing\nyou run a finger along a nail and finding a jagged edge or a response to\ngetting nervous that creates the unwanted behaviour (biting your nails) \u2013 to\ncreate a new, desired pattern of behaviour or new image (your hands looking\nimmaculate).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;You can use the swish pattern to change that\nfeeling of exhaustion after a day\u2019s work into one of being relaxed and ready to\nenjoy your evening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Identify the\nunwanted behaviour. &nbsp;You may want to stop\nbiting your nails, stop smoking, or stop yourself getting angry at small\ntransgressions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Check with yourself\nthat going ahead with the change is okay. &nbsp;Simply ask yourself: \u2018Is it okay for me to\nchange in this context?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Identify the trigger\nthat initiates the unwanted behaviour and make an associated picture (check out\nthe \u2018Associating or dissociating\u2019 section earlier in this chapter). This image\nis the cue picture. &nbsp;You may see yourself\nrunning your finger along a nail or in a situation that makes you nervous or\nangry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Play with the image\nto discover a critical submodality. &nbsp;As\nyou become more experienced, you\u2019ll be able to change one or two critical submodalities,\nbut for now start off with one. You change the submodalities of the image to\nmake the cue picture more compelling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;5. Break state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Break state means to\nchange the state or frame of mind that you\u2019re in. You can stand up and give\nyour body a good shake or move around the room when going from one phase of an\nexercise to another, allowing a natural break from the pictures and emotions of\nthe first stage of the exercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Think of the desired\nimage. Create a dissociated image of you doing a preferred behaviour or looking\na certain way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;7. Break state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Recall the cue\npicture. Make sure that you\u2019re associated into it and place a frame around it.\n( SAMBHAAALKE BHAIYYA ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Create an image of\nthe desired outcome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. Squash the desired\nimage into a very small, dark dot and place it in the bottom left corner of the\ncue picture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;11. With a swishhhh sound, propel the small,\ndark dot into the big picture so that it explodes, covering the cue picture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;12. Break state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13. Repeat the process\nseveral times speedily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If you display more kinaesthetic tendencies\nthan visual or auditory, you may<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">find the swish more\neffective when you keep your hands far apart at the start<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">of this exercise. Then,\nas you swishhhh, bring your hands together quickly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BHAAD MEIN GAYE\nSABARIMALA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>SWISSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH\n</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HUMAARA &nbsp;LODA &nbsp;AUR UNDWA KITHE ?&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TUMHAARA PAAS HAI KYA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">This reminds me of&nbsp; joke<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">During World War 2 ,\nthe dogs were treated very badly<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">So the dogs worldwide\ndecided to hold a convention to discus their grievances<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">But the convention (\nlike PARIS COP21 ) had rules bhaiyya.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The brains \u2013nay ---asses\nhad to de deposited outside the convention hall\u2014like how gora gaand keep their\nhats outside<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">During the meeting ,\nwhile the dogs were thrashing things out\u2014there as a sudden air raid<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Since there were NO\ntables to seek shelter under\u2014the dogs ran out \u2013helter skelter<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">As they ran past the ass\nrack in utter panic, they grabbed the first ass they could get .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVEN TODAY WHEN TWO\nDOGS MEET THEY SNIFF EACH OTHERS ASSES <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HUMAARA GAAND TUMHAARA\nPAASS HAI HYA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">January 7, 2017 at 12:45 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WELL WELL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">TIME TO UP THE ANTE,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWITHOUT AS MUCH AS BY YOUR LEAVE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I EXPECTED SOMEONE TO CHALLENGE ME HOW A CODE WHICH TAKES\nONE HOUR TO WRITE CAN BE DONE IN 4 LINES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY ELDER SON DID A CODING EXAM WITH THE NO 2 COMPANY ON THIS\nPLANET<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE HYPER RICH OWNER OF THIS COMPANY AND HIS WIFE COMES\nRUNNING TO INDIA GHADI GHADI ( NO NAMES )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE FIRST CODE WAS MEANT TO BE WRITTEN IN 30 MINUTES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY SON DID THE CODE IN ONE SINGLE LINE-- 23 SECONDS FLAT (\nTIMING BY THE STUNNED EXAMINER --&nbsp; A\nSENIOR MAN --AFTER HE FELL OFF HIS CHAIR AND RETRIEVED HIMSELF)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">MY SON SPENT THE NEXT 4 MINUTES EXPLAINING THE SINGLE LINE\nCODE TO THE EXAMINER, WITH A DIAGRAM&nbsp; --\nFOR HE HAD NO CLUE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I STOP HERE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">NAZAR NAHIN LAGNA MAANGTHA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">..</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/ludovico-einaudi-divenire-joy-of-music.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/ludovico-einaudi-divenire-joy-of-music.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3UpBdKvoFqk/WHFRQyM8xvI/AAAAAAABQLs/M-tY8mp3p6kVXLmzLOVRSio3ZhXJU1KmQCLcB/s1600/doEEEwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
