This instrument was found in the NW coast of Crete.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MqhuAnySPZ0</span><br />\n<br />\nIn ancient days only Kerala had the knowledge of astronomy and astrology.. The front dial has two concentric, circular scales that represent the path of the ecliptic through the heavens and only India knew of precession those days..<br />\n<br />\nThe outer ring is marked off with the days of the 365-days of the Indian calendar. .<br />\n<br />\nOn the inner ring, there is a second dial marked with the Vedic signs of the Zodiac and it is divided into degrees..The mechanism has a Rose wood casing with a front and a back door<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">TO CLAIM THAT THE INVENTION IS GREEK THE ROGUES HAVE KICKED BACK THE INSTRUMENT IN TIME TO 200 BC. &nbsp; &nbsp; IT IS FAR OLDER TO THE TIME WHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS DOING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE &nbsp;.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBY THIS TIME THE GREEKS WERE STUDYING ASTRONOMY IN KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY BELONGING TO THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN ).<br />\n<br />\nURANUS ( SHWETA ) , NEPTUNE ( SHYAMA ) AND PLUTO (TEEVRA ) WAS NOT USED IN KERALA ASTROLOGY \u2013SAME WITH THIS INSTRUMENT.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INSTRUMENT CANNOT BE MADE WITHOUT DEEP KNOWLEDGE OF CALCULUS.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThere are 54 gears inside this instrument in Shiva Shakti format \u2013in consonance with the Hindu King Mantra 108\u2014this instrument was <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>meant to move perpetually</b></span> .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST\u2014THE ARANMULA MIRROR , THE RUDRAKSHA MALA , IVORY COMB AND NANDI HUMPED BULL BELONGS TO KERALA<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE WILL EXPOSE THE IMMORAL THEFTS OF THE WHITE MAN. , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">In the following&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">list, the double\ndissociation is done through having you watch yourself in a&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">cinema (dissociation),\nwhile watching yourself on a cinema screen (double&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">dissociation)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Identify when you\nhave a phobic response to a stimulus or a traumatic&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">or unpleasant memory\nthat you want to overcome.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Remember that you\nwere safe before and are safe after the unpleasant&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">experience.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Imagine yourself\nsitting in the cinema, watching yourself on a small,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">black-and-white screen.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Now imagine floating\nout of the \u2018you\u2019 that\u2019s sitting in the cinema seat&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">and into the projection\nbooth.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. You can now see\nyourself in the projection booth, watching yourself&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">in the seat, watching\nthe film of you on the screen.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Run the film in\nblack and white, on the very tiny screen, starting&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">before you experienced\nthe memory you want to overcome and running&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">it through until after\nthe experience when you were safe.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Now freeze the film\nor turn the screen completely white.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Float out of the\nprojection booth, out of the seat, and into the end of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">the film.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Run the film\nbackwards very quickly, in a matter of a second or two,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">in full colour, as if\nyou\u2019re experiencing the film, right back to the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">beginning, when you\nwere safe.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. You can repeat\nsteps 8 and 9 until you\u2019re comfortable with the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">experience.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11. Now go into the\nfuture and test an imaginary time when you may have&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">experienced the phobic\nresponse.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BALLS !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In each re-birth on\nearth , we acquire some bad karma and some good karma.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only conscious humans\nhave bad karma baggage .&nbsp; &nbsp;Animals do NOT have karma as they have never\nrisen beyond their mooladhara chakra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In each incarnation we\nsuffer the consequences of some of our previous bad karma \u2013and every human soul\nhas a&nbsp; RESULTANT KARMIC BAGGAGE -- &nbsp;plus some\npicked up \u201c&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>soul samskaras&nbsp;</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201d &nbsp;which affect current life on the planet , like\nphobias , deep rooted vices etc . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though weighed down by\npast life samskaras , the soul ( ball of energy ) within you is a part of the\nmother field of brahmAn ( god ) .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are this ball of\nenergy. &nbsp;You are NOT what you see in the\nmirror. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU were born with the\nstars . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best way to utilise\nthe law of attraction is to adopt a positive outlook and allow life to unfold\nnaturally \u2013 trust life rather than resisting it.&nbsp;&nbsp; Don't dwell on your past mistakes or worry\nabout what might happen in the future because that will attract negativity into\nyour life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only when we expand in\nconsciousness by yoga we can really use FREE WILL to create your own destiny\nand lessen you karmic baggage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga empowers you to\ntake charge of your destiny , though it cant alter your fate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of life on\nthis planet is to be happy while pursuing the goal of lessening your karmic\nbaggage as much as possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Universe is&nbsp; not inanimate but conscious; it records our\nactions and provides feedback to us for our psychic growth through the\nmechanism of karma. This karma gets recorded in the form of inchoate formations\nin the higher mental worlds.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These formations get\nfleshed out as they descend through the various planes of consciousness until\nthey materialize at the appropriate time as events in the physical world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Law of Karma is\ninfallible and everyone&nbsp; is subjected to\nit.. &nbsp;&nbsp;Even Vishnu avatars on earth subjected themselves\nto it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the law of\nkarma, every positive deed which we do, generates&nbsp; positive marks, while every sin ( laws of\nuniverse ignored ) results in negative marks , which subsequently we need to\nrepay by enduring happiness or unhappiness in this life of the next<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During our day-to-day\ninteractions, we are either increasing or reducing the karmic baggage\nweight.&nbsp; If the karmic baggage weights\nyou will have another re-birth and another chance to lighten it.&nbsp;&nbsp; We are not consciously aware of the\ngive-and-take karmic accounts generated in our previous births.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In our subsequent\nbirths, we may or may not be equipped to settle our destiny and the paradox is\nthat at the same time we are creating new karmic accounts.&nbsp;&nbsp; Thus, this loop of karma and destiny binds\nus and we remain entangled in it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only way through\nwhich we can nullify our give and take account and destiny is through sustained\nand regular spiritual practice. &nbsp;&nbsp;There is NO NLP short cut.&nbsp; In Sanatana Dharma the true purpose of life\nis to overcome karma (destiny) and attain moksha where you become god. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ball of energy\nwithin you ( soul ) merges with brahmAn ( mother energy field ).&nbsp; The soul was once part of it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is REAL home\ncoming .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT like the\nbullshit homecoming of a lost Manipuri Jew ( sic ) in Israel. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel is trying their\nbest to repair their warped DNA ( Y chromosome ) by a imported kosher GOTRA\nsystem of DECEIT . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It wont work !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are one who is\nresponsible for whatever you are.&nbsp;&nbsp; Your\ncurrent situation is because of your past karma.&nbsp;&nbsp; We can change our destiny by our karma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have the power to\nchoose. You have the power to change. You have the power to become whatever you\nwant. &nbsp;You create your destiny using your\nFREE WILL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spirituality teaches\nyou to harness&nbsp; your thoughts, words and\nactions which can even be triggered by your past soul samskaras .&nbsp;&nbsp; You just follow the laws of the universe ,\nand things will fall in place&nbsp;&nbsp; because\nthey are the effect.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may not happen\nimmediately, but it is inevitable.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The law of cause and\neffect, action and reaction, the law of karma is an integral part of\nspirituality.&nbsp; It gives us a basis on\nwhich to make right choices and create a beautiful future for ourselves and the\nworld around us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The two currents of the mind viz., Raga and\nDvesha (attraction and repulsion) constitute world or Samsara. The mind gets\nintensely attached to pleasant objects through attraction because it derives\npleasure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wherever there is\nsensation of pleasure, the mind gets glued ( addicted porn/ drugs ) , as it\nwere, to the object that gives pleasure. This is what is called attachment.\nThis only brings bondage and pain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When either object is\nwithdrawn or perishes, the mind gets unspeakable pain. &nbsp;Attraction is the root cause of human\nsufferings. &nbsp;The mind runs from those\nobjects ( say drugs )which give pain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attraction and\npleasure, repulsion and pain coexist.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A worldly man is a\nslave of these two mighty and devastating currents. He is tossed about hither\nand thither like a piece of straw. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He smiles when he gets\npleasures, he weeps when he gets pain. He clings to pleasant objects, he runs\naway from objects that cause pain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern civilisation is\nonly another name for sensual enjoyment. &nbsp;Bimbettes attend page 3 parties or drag a long\ngown on the red carpet of Cannes. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sincere aspirant\nwill resolutely turn his back to all these sorts of shallow ego laden pleasures.\n&nbsp;He will treat them all as poison or\nshit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raga binds one to\nsamsara; vairagya liberates from bondage. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vairagya thins out the\nfatty sensual mind. It turns the mind inward. Vairagya is the most important\nqualification for a spiritual aspirant. &nbsp;Without\nit, no spiritual life is possible. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practice (abhyasa) and\nnon-attachment (vairagya) are the two core principles on which the entire\nsystem of Yoga rests. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abhyasa means having an\nattitude of persistent effort to attain and maintain a state of stable\ntranquility. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abhyasa means\ncultivating the lifestyle, actions, speech, and thoughts, as well as the\nspiritual practices that lead in the positive direction (rather than going in\nthe opposite direction, away from the positive, and towards the negative). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It means making\ndecisions on the basis of what will bring greater tranquility or peace of mind,\nas these are the preparation for the deeper, subtler practices leading to\nSelf-realization. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vairagya/Non-attachment\nis about learning to let go of the many attachments, aversions, fears, and\nfalse identities that are clouding the true Self. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vairagya is the\npractice of gradually letting go of the mental colorings that lead one away\nfrom the spiritual (rather than going in the opposite direction, giving in to\nthe attachments and aversions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be able to do the\npractices and to cultivate non-attachment, it is necessary to become better and\nbetter at discriminating between what actions, speech, and thoughts take you in\nthe right direction, and those which are a diversion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This discrimination is\nboth a foundation practice and also the subtler tool of the inner journey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attitude satkara\ncontains the principles of devotion, sincerity, respect, reverence,\npositiveness, and right choice. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you choose your\nproper level of practice, and decide to do that daily, the attitude will come\nmore easily . That little flame starts to grow slowly and consistently into a\nburning desire to guide your life in the direction of spiritual realization. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The simplest way of\ndescribing non-attachment is as the process of letting go. We gradually learn\nto let go of our attachments and aversions, systematically moving subtler and\nsubtler through the layers of attachments in the mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, non-attachment\ngoes beyond this; it is not just a practice of letting go, but is a practice of\nnot taking on in the first place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-attachment is not a\nprocess of suppression or repression of wants, wishes, desires, thoughts, or\nemotions. It comes by the ongoing practice of awareness of the existence of\nattachments (kleshas) and gradually letting these weaken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Non-attachment is not a case of doing\nsomething, but is instead a non-doing sort of thing. It means that your\nattention does not grab onto that impression in the mind in the first place.\nKarma is what WE create through our deeds, words, thoughts, actions, etc. It is\nthe realm of cause and effect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can change our\ndestiny&nbsp; by being spiritually aware and\nwilling to follow the laws of the universe in our current lifetime.&nbsp; We can meditate, and be aware of our\nchoices.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By yoga and meditation\n, you can let go of limiting thoughts and beliefs and therefore limiting\nactions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The soul carries with\nit the samskaras ( mental impressions ) it received during its earthly\nlife.&nbsp; If these samskaras created phobias\nand debilitating thoughts affecting free will in the next life\u2014&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Yoga is the only\nanswer.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary to what the\nshallow minded white man insists , Sanatana Dharma does not teach fatalism . &nbsp;&nbsp;In fact, Bhagawad Gita is all about BEING IN\nTHE MOMENT and DOING YOUR DUTY ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has been explained\nin Vedanta that&nbsp; we human beings are\npartly free and partly determined. It nonsense to say that fate places\nobstacles in the way of free will. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism leaves man\nquite free to act, using his own conscience ( which is NOT afforded by any\nother single holy book religion ). Sanatana Dharma just guides and by pointing\nman in the right direction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindusim does NOT allow\nman to escape responsibility by blaming fate,( for fate is of his own making ),\nnor by blaming God, for He is but the dispenser of fruits in accordance with\nthe merits of actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism states that we\nare the master of our own destiny. It is for us to make it, to better it or to\nspoil it.&nbsp; This is our privilege. This is\nour responsibility. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindus who knows his\nreligion will straight away that Ashtavakra Gita is a FAKE document created and\nbackdated by the white invader.&nbsp; For\nthere is NO wisdom discernible like in our other scriptures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAME WAY THERE IS ZERO\nWISDOM IN NLP<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient wisdom emanated\nfrom how our maharishis lived their lives. These supermen did NOT root their\nhappiness on something they could lose. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These wise men took\nresponsibility for the future . They taught us to unlearn and to walk away from\nnegativity. They taught us to witness and know ourselves .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wisdom is to the soul,\nwhat health is to the physical body \u2013 ancient yoga did NOT lose track of this.\nUniversal forces of fate, destiny, karma, free will, and the Law of Attraction\nare all&nbsp; intertwined<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate is what is in place\nat your birth-fate chose your relatives , NOT your friends .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma, and the Law of\nAttraction are all important ingredients of destiny.&nbsp;&nbsp; The key that turns them into destiny, is the\nunique essence of who you are in this lifetime, right here, right now, and how\nit dictates the choices you make using free will. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Laws of karma do NOT\napply to animals as they do NOT have an ego.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ego is the soul\u2019s worst enemy.&nbsp; Small children less than 27 months age ( who\nhave NOT built an ego ) and Jivan Mukts devoid of ego ( who will attain moksha)\nare buried , NOT burnt, . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cremation is symbolic\nof burning negative ego laden samskaras . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN A DEAD BODY IS NOT\nCREMATED, IT REMAINS TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER\u2014MISERABLE AND LONELY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cellular Memory is the\nterm often used to describe subconscious body imprints. In the form of\nregression therapy&nbsp; it is essential to\nrelive the past life as fully as possible during the session.. Trauma causes\nfreezing and dissociation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One needs to uncover\nthe depth of the past life characters experience to actually heal it.&nbsp;&nbsp; Reliving the past life helps in the\n\u2018unfreezing process.\u2019 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In essence, unfreezing\nwakes up that soul fragment that may still be stuck or split off from the whole\npsyche. Reliving acts as a way to revive this \u2018dead\u2019 aspect of the soul. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recalling a past life\nstory from the perspective of an observer, instead of being fully in the story\nsuggests that a dissociated part of the psyche is having the memory. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A dissociated memory is\nnot an accurate account because, that part of the psyche split off as soon as\nthings got difficult. Every past life we have had ended in death. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each death is a\ndecisive transition stage for the soul. In therapy, this is where the most\ncrucial part of the healing begins\u2014finishing the unfinished business. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskara is the\nMalayalam / Sanskrit word for an indelible impression, from a current or past\nlife, stored in the subconscious mind which cannot be easily recalled to the\nconscious mind and generates a predetermined thought pattern, behavior or\ninfluence that can negatively affect one\u2019s current life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By erasing the\ninfluence of the Samskara, a person can become free of its effect in order to\nlead a more conscious, productive, happy, and fulfilled life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychotherapy only\napproaches specific Samskaras from our current life, such as child hood issues.\nHowever, many Samskaras from a previous life or lives can still have an\ninfluence in and upon our current life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the strongest\nimpressions are from a traumatic death which then shows up as fears and\nphobias.&nbsp; Past life regression cannot\nerase past Karmas but helps in performing Karmas better by removing some of the\nimpediments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasanas affect our\nability to live fully in the present moment and curtail our true nature.&nbsp; The conscious mind can access the conscious\nmind, memories and intellect, but not the subconscious.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP METHODS ARE SHALLOW\nAND MINDLESS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind,\nthe causal body, that stores these impressions can be tackled through\nsubconscious states.&nbsp;&nbsp; Through deep\nmeditation we can access these deeper layers of our existence and memories from\nprevious lives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By exploring our own\npast lives we become aware of these repetitive, unconscious patterns and we\nerase our past by resolving those patterns.&nbsp;\nOnly then, are we free from our past and the whole past is dropped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without making peace\nwith the past we will not progress.. Karma is not punishment system. Karma is a\nfeed back system through that we learn our lessons from the past and evolve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past-Life-Regression\nhelps individuals to understand the karmic patterns involved and the resultant\nenergy blockages. It is these energy blockages that manifest as diseases, which\nare sometimes chronic. The understanding that flows clears the energy blockages\nand thereby the disease is healed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example a person\nwho had this fear of closed spaces (claustrophobia) had experienced a past life\nwhere he was buried alive in an earthquake. Once he relives this trauma, he was\nable to overcome his claustrophobia immediately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past-Life-Regression\nhelps us to explore our past lives and through this exploration we realize that\nwe are eternal beings. We understand that death is a mere transition from one\nstate to another and that the essence of our being continues into eternity as\nwe have lived before and are going to live again after \u2018death\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Experienced and\nqualified past-life-regression-facilitators do not give suggestions during\nregression.&nbsp; They only direct the client\nto seek the root cause of an issue, or the memory of the client's present\nproblems and situations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only an experienced\npractitioner whose belief system is compatible with the concept of past lives\nshould conduct past-life-regression work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samskaras which have\nleft a very deep impression on our personality.&nbsp;\nSoul Samskara has nothing to do with our intellect or buddhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We should not look at\nthings only from the intellectual standpoint but from the aspect of the total\npersonality. This is what meditation teaches.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time of mantra\nmeditation a 108 bead rudraksha mala is therefore very important. Shifting 108\nbeads is NO superstition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mala does not allow\nan individual to become completely submerged in the unknown depths of\nconsciousness. It maintains one part of the awareness outside, on the process\nof moving and reversing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans are the result\nof their deeper mind and its store of countless impressions from the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankalpa is a\nresolution for self transformation out of free will.&nbsp; When divinity is added to the Sankalpa; it\ngains strength and gets proper direction. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga Nidra provides the\ntools to \u2018weed out\u2019 these unconscious negative patterns and in their stead\nplant positive seeds deep in the subconscious mind, gradually allowing\nexpression from the highest aspect of the self.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga Nidra not only\nteaches that the conscious mind obediently follows in the wake of the\nsubconscious and unconcious mind, it also reveals the gateway to the garden of\nthe deeper mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Utilising the sankalpa\nprovides the tools needed to plant whatever is desired in the life of each\nindividual. The only limitation is the imagination. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankalpa is not a\nmundane&nbsp; new year\u2019s resolution of the&nbsp; shallow minded white man.&nbsp; Sankalpa is an intent when in a receptive\nstate.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankalpa is a short,\npositive statement or affirmation, mentally repeated whilst sinking into a\ndeeply relaxed alpha mind state. It acts as a foundation in accomplishing the\ntask or reaching the goal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sankalpa mentally\nstated with conviction, faith, and determination used daily will grow very\nstrong roots and will bloom willingly.&nbsp;\nAwareness is directed to a particular possibility that exists within,\npresenting a goal which, with repeated use, will gradually manifest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern society trains\nthe individual to ignore that the power of transformation lies within.&nbsp; There is always a tendency to blame external\nfactors for unhappiness and difficulties.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma / Vishnu / Shiva\nwork in tandem and perfect harmony\u2014amazing cosmic allegories personalized as\nHindu Gods.&nbsp;&nbsp; They have their female\nconsort wives Saraswati/ Laxmi/ Parvati without which they are powerless<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cosmic spiraling\ndance of&nbsp; separate opposing forces, which\nsustains this universe. No life is possible on earth without this subtle\ntension .&nbsp;&nbsp; What has a front has a back--\nwhat has a beginning has an end.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One cannot exist\nwithout the other and they are dependant .&nbsp;\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite.&nbsp; They consume each other yet support each\nother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever is in excess\ngets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yang elements are clear\nand obvious while Yin elements are subtle or hidden behind the quantum screen..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must ponder over\neach waxing-waning cycle to appreciate the absolute truth . They keep each\nother in check, yet provide fuel to feed off each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the restraining\nbalance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will\nspiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER\ngod. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As for the opposing\nforces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who,\nlike in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This principle of\nDvaita Hinduism -- Tamas Rajas , which are rooted together , is present in\nevery phenomenon on earth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta has\nrecorded&nbsp; 7000 years ago, that energy\ntransforms from one to another\u2014it can neither be created or destroyed. These\ntwo opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect\nharmony.&nbsp; Harmony can never be stagnant\n.&nbsp; Lessening of Tamas always results in\nincrease of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balance can never be\npermanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tamas influences Rajas\nnot only from inside but also from outside.. they are rooted together.&nbsp; Tamas and Rajas are connected through\nconsciousness.&nbsp; It is about the quantum\npossibility wave vibration between two poles. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Vedic Indian\nrishis on the banks of the river Saraswati, firmly believed that the invisible\nbelow the quantum screen gives rise to the visible.&nbsp; So either Tamas or Rajas is visible \u2013 never\nboth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\ncooked up cock and bull stories,&nbsp; how the\nthree trinity gods held competitions to see who is stronger ?&nbsp; This white lie is now sunk forever \u2013 never to\nresurface .&nbsp;&nbsp; Let the Shaivites and\nVaishnavites wedged apart by the FAKE mutts of the white invader ( divide and\nrule ) know this truth today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no accidents\nin the way the cosmos works.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your energy, translated\ninto thoughts, words, emotions, and deeds, causes all your experiences. This\nassures that you always have the learning opportunities you require to resolve\nyour Karma, and, as with you, the collective thoughts, words, emotions, and\ndeeds of mankind create the environment for us all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If enough souls focus\ntheir energy upon peace, we will have peace.&nbsp;\nIf the majority of souls are filled with anger and vindictiveness , we\nmay all have to experience war.&nbsp; We are\nall one, and like the many sub-personalities within you, the dominant traits of\nmankind&nbsp; will emerge to resolve our group\nKarma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harmony is the flow of\nlife.&nbsp;&nbsp; Everything strives for harmony,\nfor balance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stronger determines\nthe weaker and makes it equal to itself.&nbsp;\nEverything around you is energy, including your thoughts and feelings.\nThese energies create vibrations that are either harmonious or disharmonious\nwith the universe and can not only affect you, but the people you come in contact\nwith. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we live in fear,\nwe can be easily controlled. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative emotions, such\nas fear, jealousy and envy, will keep you living in a state of disharmony and\ncreate blockages which in turn, will bring repetitive cycles of negative\nemotions and experiences until you can finally release whatever disharmonious\nemotion or experience that is attached to you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, when we\nget angry at someone, it usually isn\u2019t something we personally dislike within\nthat person, but more likely, it is something that we fear within\nourselves.&nbsp; This provides us an\nOPPORTUNITY to overcome this fear or negative emotion through self-reflection\nwhile helping us on our spiritual progressions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma allows\nyou to witness yourself. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By aligning yourself\nwith positive energy, you will in turn receive positive energy.&nbsp; When you align yourself with negative energy,\nyou create a disharmonious ripple effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This law supersedes\neven the fundamental law of Karma, for harmony is the supreme potential of\nbalance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of Karma is\nto attain harmony. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is\nperfectly balanced by natural and moral laws. When you work within the laws,\nyou can be assured of an eventual positive outcome. When the laws are\ntransgressed, suffering will result.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The purpose of karma is also to attain\nbalance. The universe is perfectly balanced. When you are in harmony you are in\nbalance. There is nothing permanent without harmony as harmony can be\nconsidered another name for Love.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Once you have evolved to the position of\nliving an entire life in harmony, you are free from the wheel of reincarnation.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;You have got Moksha. You soul ( YOU )\nhas shot up to the seventh astral layer or Vaikunta and merged with brahmAn\u2014and\nyou are now god.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Until you have resolved\nyour Karma and fulfilled your Dharma, you will continue to reincarnate into\nsequential lifetimes upon the earth.&nbsp; You\ndecide what lessons you need to learn for each life experience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever you act with\nintention (actions being your thoughts, emotions, words and deeds and the\nmotive, intent and desire) you create good karma.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dis-harmonious acts,\nare rooted in fear-based emotions, must be eventually balanced and resolved.\nWhen you can live a life of perfect harmony, liberation will follow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is\nrooted in wisdom.&nbsp; There are no bullshit\nlaws and rules like in the single holy book single messiah religions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you can learn your\nlessons harmoniously through Love and Wisdom then you will diminish or erase\nyour dis-harmonious karma.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Many learn fastest through pain and suffering\nbecause one can see the direct consequences of their dis-harmonious actions and\nintentions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wisdom (past life\nawareness and present life learning) allows you to detatch from painful and\nchallenging situations with love<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man of wisdom can\nnever lack grace.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma can be\nexperienced in pain and suffering, or it can be experienced in grace. The\nchoice is yours. If you give love , fairness with grace , you will receive the\nsame in return.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Promote what you love\ninstead of kicking what you hate. You cant live a positive life with a negative\nmind.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negativity , ego and\ngreed steals your happiness. No matter how much you resist, there are some\nthings or situations which cannot be changed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Change what you can\nchange, but have the wisdom to accept unalterable situations as they are\nwithout wasting mental or physical energy attempting to change what you cannot\nchange. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out of this acceptance\ncomes involved detachment--the ability to enjoy all the positive aspects of\nlife, but to allow the negativity to flow through you without resistance and\nwithout affecting you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life is all about\npaying a bad hand well and with grace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read the line above\ntwice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing in the Universe\ncan harm you except your own attitude.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read the line above\nthrice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God has made you\nconscious , with free will and empowered you with choice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You, and you alone\nchoose the attitude with what you will respond.&nbsp;\nYour attitude can worsen or lighten any event. No two people respond to\nthe same situation in the same way.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every earthly\nincarnation includes traumatic experiences, and the better you understand the\nworkings of Karma, the more likely you will be to put events in a spiritual\nperspective.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the magic of\nSanatana Dharma steeped in spiritually and not graceless MAAR DOH KAAFIR\nINFIDEL SAALE KOH type graceless dogma.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Hindu will ever rush\nout of temples after Friday prayers and kill people.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Hindu goes on a\npilgrimage to throw stones at some TRINITY pillar depicting devil with faces\nshowing extreme negativity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only a mind dipped in\nSanatana Dharma can be a change manager. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why white men\ncome to India for life management which involves CHANGE. &nbsp;This is why no shallow minded white man\ncreated NLP can drive change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Effective life\nmanagement means creating an equilibrium .&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Life is a combination or\nphysical, intellectual and spiritual aspects.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWhen you enter a spiritual life , you can see a situation as it is from\ndifferent angles and not as you want.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Belief in predetermined\ndestiny is the only refuge of weak minds clinging on to single messiah\nreligions .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism teaches you to\ntake responsibility for your failures.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nSanatana Dharma teaches you to be IN THE MOMENT .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destiny is commonly\nregarded as fate- &nbsp;but both are as\ndifferent as chalk and cheese.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate is usually seen as\n\"set in stone\" and often has negative connotations.&nbsp;&nbsp; Fate is an agent that predetermines and\norders the course of events. It means that events are \"meant to be\"\nand are set in motion by an external force or intelligence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destiny is more of a\nlikely outcome and often has a positive feel, e.g. he is destined to become a\nstar.&nbsp;&nbsp; Destiny guides us towards a\nspecific goal, but without our wilful participation we will not achieve our\ndestiny. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
