Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399892786#c214556610071273335\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi k,<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.smh.com.au/national/mathematician-reveals-hidden-5-7m-year-cycle-behind-the-date-of-easter-20180328-p4z6qd.html</span><br />\nTHE CUNT IS MAKING ROCKET SCIENCE OUT OF SIMPLE ASTROLOGY<br />\n<br />\nEaster, also called Resurrection Day is a Christian holiday celebrating Jesus Christ returning from the dead.<br />\n<br />\nEaster is not held on the same date every year. This is called a moveable feast. Western churches, like the Roman Catholic Church, use the Gregorian calendar, while Eastern churches, like the Eastern Orthodox Church, use the Julian calendar. In 2015 Easter was celebrated on April 5 for both the Gregorian calendar and Julian calendar.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Jesus Christ never existed\u2014but was cooked up by Roman Emperor Constntine the Great at the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD, which included an astronomer sage from Kerala&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE STUPID \u201cPOPE TO BE\u201dWANTED EASTER TO BE THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER THE FULL MOON AFTER THE VERNAL EQUINOX.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nVishu is the second biggest festival in Kerala and it ushers in the Malayalam new year<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian calendar was designed to keep the vernal equinox on or close to March 21, so that the date of Easter is celebrated on the Sunday after the full moon.. Read this line TWICE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">EASTER IS CELEBRATED BY CHRISTIANS BETWEEN LAST WEEK MARCH TO LAST WEEK APRIL.</span></b><br />\nTHIS YEAR FOR WESTERN CHURCH IT IS APRIL 1ST AND FOR EASTERN CHURCH ARRIL 8TH<br />\nIn 1818 the Paschal Full Moon fell on Saturday March 21 (the equinox). Therefore, the following day, March 22, was Easter. It will not fall as early again until 2285, a span of 467 years. The next earliest Easter between 1818 and 2285 (March 23) occurred in 1845, 1856, 1913 and 2008, and will occur again in 2160--a 11, 57, 95 and 152-year gap, respectively.<br />\n<br />\nThe earliest dates for Easter in the Eastern Orthodox Church between 1875 and 2099 are, 22 March 1915 and 22 March 2010. Both dates are equivalent to April 4 in the Gregorian Calendar.<br />\n<br />\nDespite using calendars that are apart by 13 days, Easter 2014 fell on the same date. According to the Western (Gregorian) calendar, the first Paschal Full Moon after the Spring Equinox (March 20) fell on Monday, April 14, 2014. The following Sunday, April 20, was, therefore, Easter Day.<br />\n<br />\nThe Gregorian Calendar was created so that annual astronomical events, specifically the vernal equinox (used to determine when Easter is), would on average keep their places in the calendar year over time.<br />\n<br />\nThere are two ways of finding how long it takes the sun to complete its apparent revolution in the heavens, or, in other words, how long it takes the earth to make a complete revolution around it.<br />\n<br />\nOne of these consists in observing the exact time at which the sun reaches the equinoxes. In ancient times astronomical observers were able to do this by noting the days when the sun rose exactly in the east or set exactly in the west. By observing the rising and setting from day to day, they could find not only the day, but almost the hour in which the sun was on the celestial equator<br />\n<br />\nThe period between two returns of the sun to the same equinox is called the solar year or equinoxial year. The other way of finding the length of the year consists in observing the interval of time between two passages of the sun past the same star in the heavens; for example, the period between two of its passages past one of the stars<br />\n<br />\nThe ancient Kerala astronomers got the same result by using the moon as an intermediate object to measure from. The moon could be seen before sunset and its distance from the sun determined. Then, when the star appeared after sunset, the distance from the star to the moon was measured.<br />\n<br />\nAllowing for the motion of the moon during the interval, the apparent distance between the sun and the star could thus be learned from day to day. In this way it could be found how many days it was between the times at which the sun was at the same distance from any given bright star.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_66B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_67B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1418662716273968311\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_67M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522399955591#c1418662716273968311\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 30, 2018 at 2:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThis would be the period of apparent revolution of the sun in the celestial sphere, or, as we now know it to be, the period of one revolution of the earth in its orbit. This period is called the sidereal year, because it is fixed by the stars.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH HIPPARCHUS AND. PTOLEMY LEARNT IN THE KONDUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN )<br />\n<br />\nWith our exact modern observations we have found the lengths of the years to be:--<br />\n<br />\nSolar year/ 365 d. 5 h. 48 m. 46 s.<br />\nSidereal year/ 365 d 6 h 9 m 9 s<br />\nDifference/ 20 m. 23 s.<br />\n<br />\nThis difference shows that the position of the equinoxes among the stars is changing from year to year-- nearly one degree in 70 years.<br />\n<br />\nThe tropics of Cancer and Capricorn mark the extreme north and south latitudes where the Sun can appear directly overhead. Because the vernal equinox moves back along the ecliptic due to precession, a tropical year is shorter than a sidereal year (in 2000, the difference was 20 m 23 s<br />\n<br />\nThe number of mean solar days in a vernal equinox year has been oscillating between 365.2424 and 365.2423 for several millennia and will likely remain near 365.2424 for a few more. This long-term stability is pure chance, because in our era the slowdown of the rotation, the acceleration of the mean orbital motion, and the effect at the vernal equinox of rotation and shape changes in the Earth's orbit, happen to almost cancel out.<br />\n<br />\nEarth's pole aligns with different pole stars throughout its precessional period. Polaris is Earth's current north-pole star. Earth's 25675 -year precessional cycle is also referred to as \"Earth's Great Year.\"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEarth's axis is tilted 23\u00b0 27' with respect the plane created by Earth's orbit around the Sun (the ecliptic plane)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n#######################################################<br />\nCapt. In other words, it is a projection of the terrestrial equator out into space. As a result of the Earth's axial tilt, the celestial equator is inclined by 23.4\u00b0 with respect to the ecliptic plane.<br />\n<br />\nThe ecliptic is an imaginary line on the sky that marks the annual path of the sun. It is the projection of Earth\u2019s orbit onto the celestial sphere.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST POINT OF ARIES ( VERNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE SOUTH TO NORTH ON ECLIPTIC) CORRESPONDS WITH THE GREENWICH MERIDIAN ON PLANET EARTH AND SO LONGITUDE IS DERIVED FROM THIS AFTER A CELESTIAL SIGHT USING SEXTANT<br />\n<br />\n180 DEGREES OPPOSITE IS THE \"FIRST POINT OF LIBRA\" ( AUTUMNAL EQUINOX --SUN PASSAGE NORTH TO SOUTH ON ECLIPTIC ) WHICH CORRESPONDS TO THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE. AGAIN THIS POINT IS NO LONGER IN LIBRA , BUT IN VIRGO DUE TO PRECESSION<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nNovember 29, 2017 at 7:44 PM<br />\n<br />\nOn the vernal (spring) and autumnal (fall) equinoxes, day and night are nearly the same length ...<br />\n<br />\nAn equinox is regarded as the moment in which the plane of Earth's equator passes through the center of the Sun's disk, which occurs twice each year, around 20 March and 23 September.<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS VISHU CELEBRATED ONLY IN KERALA FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS ---BECAUSE THOSE DAYS ONLY KERALA SAGES KNEW ASTRONOMY .<br />\n<br />\nVEDIC KNOWLEDGE MEANS KERALA DANAVA KNOWLEDGE .<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER CALLED HINDUS SUPERSTITIOUS SAVAGES BECAUSE WE CELEBRATED VISHU ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/vishu-new-year-festival-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WANT ALL TO WATCH THIS VIDEO BELOW<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=95ZfHttIHYQ</span><br />\n<br />\nWHO TILTED EARTH TO 23.4 DEGREES?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_68MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Physicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Qubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Entanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Vedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Vedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span></span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Maharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">It\u2019s main postulates are:--</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">All of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Except ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Space-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">There are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Energy and mass are equivalent.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Here are some of the Sutras: ---</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">Force is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">In the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">The forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">V.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.</span><br />\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<ol id=\"bc_0_176TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_172B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1348481307020028419\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_172M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. A girl like goddess born to humans. 'There was none on earth to match her loveliness. Gods, anti-gods, and yakshas yearned for such celestial beauty.' (169:45-47, Adi Parva, Mahabharata)<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi\u2019s biological parents were Agni and Swaha . She was adopted by Drupad, King of Panchala, which is why her name was changed from Agni Jyotsna to Princess of Panchala to Drupad Kanya to Draupadi. The sages called her Yajna Seni as she was born from the sacrificial fire.<br />\n<br />\nShe was a fully grown woman, dressed in the best of sSilk, unusually rare jewelry. A dark complexioned maiden, so dark, that when her hair brushed over her face, the black raven like hair, looked golden brown, so dark was her complexion.<br />\n<br />\nVoluptuous with a slender waist. She had a naturally aromatic odor that could be sensed a \u2018yojana\u2019 away (a measurement for distance).<br />\n<br />\nDraupadi as Kundalini has five human chakras she has to cross before she finds refuge in the topmost Sahasrara chakra ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD WHITE INVADER MADE DRAUPADI A DAUGHTER (NALAYANI ) OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI IN HER PREVIOUS BIRTH .. WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF NALA AND DAMAYANTI TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nRAHU AND KETU WERE WOVEN INTO THE \"BHAKTI MOVEMENT \" BULLSHIT STORY .. ROTHSCHILD GOT THIS FAKE STORY ADAPTED INTO KERALA KATHAKALI..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS WROTE A BULLSHIT BOOK ON COOKERY ( PAKADARPANAM-- WITH BEEF ) AND TOLD THAT NALA , AN EXCELLENT COOK WROTE IT. ROTHSCHILD GOT THE CRYPTO JEW KARALA PRINCE RAVI VARMA TO PAINT NALA AND DAMAYANTI.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BHAKTi MOVEMENT AND ITS HEROES WERE CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. Today this ancient university is a Muslim mosque. Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 =&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521592996238#c4848674592747964571\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nThis brings us squarely into the discussion of what Words mean and indeed to the philosophical question of what Meaning itself means. A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. ANCIENT HINDUS HEARD SRUTI VERSES\u2014&nbsp; THEY SAW IT TOO IN THEIR GREAT FRACTAL MINDS</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7380140728632971986\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: medium; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_128M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521641838855#c7380140728632971986\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 7:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_128MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOME ONE ASKED ME ABOUT MY STATEMENT BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Jesuit JEW Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Pons ( an expert in Sanskrit ) was in Kerala scrounging for Sanskrit texts in Math and Astronomy. He died in Chandernagor (Mission of Bengal in India ) in 1752..<br />\n<br />\nBy 1734, Jean-Fran\u00e7ois Pons called Jesuit JEW Antoine Gaubil \u2013and between them they deciphered Kerala astronomy .. they then charted 65 Indian cities on a map with Latitude and Longitude. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nWELL BEFORE THESE TWO THIEVES THAT WAS A JEW JOHN HOLWELL ( DIED 1686 ) WHO COLLECTED BOOKS ON CALCULUS AND ASTRONOMY FROM THE KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF ISAAC NEWTON DIED ONLY IN 1729<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLATER JOHN HOLWELLs SON JEW ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WOULD BUT KERALA TEAK AND ROSEWOOD FOR MAKING SHIPS IN LONDON..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN HOLWELLs GRANDSON JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL ( DIED 1798 )WAS A ROTHSCHILDs AGENT WHO CAME TO KERALA STOLE FROM SUSTRUTA SAMHITA AND BECAME A FAMOUS SURGEON..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIEF EDWARD JENNER ( FATHER OF VACCINATION ) DIED ONLY IN 1823 .. WE IN KERALA HAVE BEEN VACCINATING EGYPTIAN PHARAOHS THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/edward-jenner-leech-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS A SURVIVOR OF THE \"BLACK HOLE OF CALCUTTA\" AND HE GAVE AN EXAGGERATED VERSION SO THAT ROTHSCHILD COULD USE THIS AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA , IF YOU ASK A GENERAL OR A DGP --WHAT IS \"HEGELIAN DIALECTIC\" -THE CUNT WONT EVEN KNOW.. SO MUCH FOR OUR TRAINING ..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS ELECTED FELLOW OF THE ROYAL SOCIETY IN 1767--AS HE GAVE MANY OF HIS STOLEN BOOKS FROM KERALA IN AYURVEDA AND MATH. ROTHSCHILD WOULD USE HIM FOR VACCINATING HIS WHITE SOLDIERS.<br />\n<br />\nIN GRATITUDE ROTHSCHILD MADE JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL GOVERNOR OF BENGAL --SUCCEEDING ROBERT CLIVE--ANOTHER THIEF OF THE FIRST ORDER.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WE MUST THANK JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL FOR DECLARING IN ENGLAND TO THE PUBLIC THAT INDIANS ARE NOT A BUNCH OF SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nIT SHOCKED THE WHITE ENGLISH PUBLIC WHEN HE WROTE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Homer, Virgil, Lucretius, Ovid, Lucian availed themselves of the simple cosmology of Brahma and derived their myths of creation from the Hindus. --from these Hindoos our Mitton copied -- Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, borrowed their mythology and cosmology from the doctrines of the Indian Hindoo\"<br />\n<br />\nHolwell in his Preliminary Discourse to the Religious Tenets of the Gentoos&nbsp;said :&nbsp; \"Having sediously perused all that has been written of the empire of&nbsp;ndostan, both as to its ancient as well as more modem state; as also the various&nbsp;accounts transmitted to us, by authors in almost all ages ... I venture to pronounce them all very defective, fallacious and unsatisfactory to an inquisitive searcher after tmth; and only tending to convey a very imperfect and injurious resemblance of a people, who from the earliest times have been an ornament to the creation if so much can with propriety be said of any known people upon earth\".<br />\n<br />\nHolwell wrote \u201c'Pythagoras and Plato came to India and borrowed the doctrines of the unity of Godhead, ... from the Brahmins of India\u201d. This statement was deleted by Jew Rothschild ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />John Zephaniah Holwell</span>&nbsp;thus established the great antiquity of the Indian people and their literature. He, expressing himself against superficial studies, emphasized the need for a new orientation to Indian studies.<br />\n<br />\nIn this context he told not to depend only on the application of European standards to the study of India's past\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAT LEAST WE HAVE A HONEST JEW IN SURGEON JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL--UNLIKE HIS MATHEMATICIAN GRANDFATHER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WE INDIANS ARE GRATEFUL TO THIS JEW&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayi<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_215b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_215b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_215b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_215b+seedDYD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_125b+seedcrbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Through uniting with Purusha ( Shiva ) &nbsp;, Prakriti &nbsp;( Shakti ) gave form to his spirit and created the universe.&nbsp; (we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here - not street side sex&nbsp; as figured out by small minds)..&nbsp; When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.&nbsp; Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.&nbsp; &nbsp;Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation.&nbsp; The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise&nbsp; is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530415378869#c4175653428974212085\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 1, 2018 at 8:52 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID YOU PUT A VIDEO OF YOURSELF DOING BICEPS CURLS WITH 25 KG DUMB BELLS?<br />\n<br />\nIS IT TO BOAST ABOUT YOUR BRUTE STRENGTH?<br />\n<br />\nOH BLIMEY-- NOW I HAVE TO LET GO ANOTHER OF MY LEADERSHIP SECRETS !<br />\n<br />\nIT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO PROVE YOU ARE BETTER THAN YOUR TEAM IN THE BRAINS DEPT .. PEOPLE JUST DONT ACCEPT IT..<br />\n<br />\nBUT IT IS VERY EASY TO PROVE THAT YOUR ARE FASTER THAN SOME ONE IN A SPRINT OR STRONGER IN A GYM...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MAN IS STILL AN ANIMAL --ALBEIT A SOCIAL ONE</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU PROVE YOU ARE STRONGER THAN SOMEONE --HE HAS NO PROBLEMS IN ACCEPTING YOU ARE BETTER THAN HIM IN THE BRAINS DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE:<br />\n<br />\nA BRIT USED TO COME IN OUR GYM.. A VERY STRONG FELLOW-- TALLER THAN ME, HIS BICEPS WERE TWICE THE SIZE OF MINE , HE WAS ONE YEAR YOUNGER.<br />\n<br />\nONCE OR TWICE I HAD A CONVERSATION WITH HIM, HE GAVE ME THE FEELING THAT HE THINKS HE IS BETTER THAN ME IN THE BRAINS DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nI DO EXPERIMENTS ..<br />\n<br />\nI NOTICE THAT HE DID CURLS ON THE 25 KG DUMB BELLS - AND BEFORE DOING THAT HE TOOK OUT TWO HANDKERCHIEFS TO WRAP IT AROUND THE \" UNUSED HENCE SHARP \" KNURLED STEEL HANDLE..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT HAVE HIS OWN GYM GLOVES WHICH COVERED THE FINGERS TOO ( BRUISING DIE TO SKIN GETTING SCRAPED OFF ) ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/dumb-bells-challenge-real-thing-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIT JUST PROVED HE WAS SERIOUS-- HE WOULD KEEP THE DUMB BELLS DOWN ONLY IF HIS BICEPS OR BACK HURT--NOT BECAUSE HIS PALM SKIN WAS HURTING ( THE WAY OTHER PRETENDED ).<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I DID THE 25 KG DUMB BELLS CURLS , I BROUGHT MY OWN HANDKERCHIEFS TO WRAP AROUND THE HANDLE.<br />\n<br />\nSO ONE DAY WHEN HE FINISHED ON THE 25 KG DUMBELLS --I ASKED HIM \"CAN I TAKE IT \" AND STARTED WRAPPING MY CLOTH PIECES .. HE WAS NOW WATCHING ME VIA THE MIRROR.<br />\n<br />\nI DID TWICE OF WHAT HE DID ON HALF THE TIME..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I LOOKED AT HIS FACE , IT WAS RED-- HE WAS EMBARRASSED ..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN MY YOUNGER SON DID THE MACHINES HE USUALLY DOES-- PUTTING ALL PINS AT HIGHEST NOTCH.. MY SON IS 1/3 OF HIS AGE AND HE WEIGHS 20 KGS MORE THAN HIM..<br />\n<br />\nHE AVOIDED THOSE MACHINES LIKE THE PLAGUE.. I HAD CRAMPED HIS COCKY STYLE<br />\n<br />\nI KNEW HE WAS FROM THE VILLAGE WHERE STONEHENGE IS BUILT. HE HAD TOLD ME THAT ALIENS BUILT THE STONEHENGE AS IT IS SUPERHUMAN..<br />\n<br />\nNOW THAT I HAD CRAMPED HIS STYLE-- I ASKED HIM, IF HE DID ICE SLEDGING AS A CHILD..<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID-- YES..<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I TOLD HIM-- IF YOU GIVE ME THREE STRONG MEN , I DONT NEED ALIENS -I WILL BUILD THE SAME STRUCTURE.<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM--<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW THE STONE QUARRY FROM WHERE THE STONES WERE SOURCED.. IN WINTER I WOULD SLIDE IT DOWNHILL ON THE ICE AND FIT IT IN PLACE ..USING LONG LEVERS..<br />\n<br />\nHE KEPT QUIET<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I ASKED HIM-- DO YOU KNOW HOW MANY PORTALS ARE THERE..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT KNOW.<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM-- 27 NAKSHATRAS ( PORTALS ) WITH 4 PADAS MADE THE NUMBER 108, AND THIS IS THE DIGITAL NUMBER OF OM, OUR HINDU KING MANTRA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DRUID SAGES WHO BUILT THE STONEHENGE WERE HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS QUIET FOR SOME TIME AND THEN HE SAID \" TODAY I HAVE LEARNT SOMETHING \"<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mystery-of-stonehenge-solved-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS A CHANGE MANAGER AT SEA.. YOU CANNOT CHANGE ALL BY THE SAME WAY..BY SHOVING THINGS DOWN THE THROAT. YOU HAVE TO MAKE THEM BITE.<br />\n<br />\nALL MY DETRACTORS HAVE FALLEN BY THE WAY SIDE TODAY.. PEOPLE DONT ARGUE ANYMORE--WHEN I SAY THIS IS THE WAY THE COOKIE CRUMBLED..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY NO MUSLIM ARGUES WHEN I SAY THAT QUTAB MINAR IS A HINDU STRUCTURE<br />\n<br />\nQUTAB MINAR IS MEANT TO BE SEEN FROM TOP FROM A HOVERING HELICOPTER..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TOP BRAHMA PLATFORM WAS UNSTABLE-- MEANT TO SHOW THE PRECESSION OF THE EARTH.. WHETHER WE ARE AT TAURUS OR ARIES OR PISCES OR AQUARIUS ( 24000 YEARS ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE BASE WAS PORTALS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5221859193983715621\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_96M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/15986226989774467170\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">jay mohan</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_21.html?showComment=1532228005084#c5221859193983715621\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 22, 2018 at 8:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_96MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDelhi is full of Graves of invaders spewing negative energy. IT COULD HAPPEN ONLY BECAUSE THESE VERSES HAD DIVINE MATH\nEMBEDDED.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES ,\nPASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL,\nPRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY WE HINDUS INSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED\nFROM AKASHA.. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED\nIN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM\nSCREEN.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT\nWHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION (\nPRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR\nWILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSFORMER ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS\nWAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS\nNAME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY\nSHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY VISHNU HAS MORTAL AVATARS --SHIVA AND BRAHMA CANNOT\nHAVE MORTAL AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. MAN IS JUST A CHANNEL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE AIM OF A HINDU IS LIBERATION FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS-- SO\nTHAT HIS SOUL CAN GO HOME AND MERGE WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY WHEN THE SOUL FREQUENCY AND FREQUENCY\nOF THE MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ( MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \u2013SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER ) IS THE SAME.. WHEN THIS HAPPENS NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO AND THE\nHUMAN EGO IS ZERO.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE ARE JIVAN MUKTS ( ALIVE ON PLANET EARTH ) WHOSE EGO IS\nZERO AND WHOSE SOULS HAVE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHOSE FIELD EXTENDS TILL EARTH..\nTHESE ARE THE COMPASSIONATE SAGES WE REFER TO IN OUR PURANAS . A JIVAN MUKT HAS\nHIS KUNDALINI RAISED TO SAHASRARA CHAKRA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nROGUES GO TO HIMALAYAS PRETEND TO HAVE SEEN ROTHSCHIDs\nCREATION BABAJI AND CLAIM TO HAVE INSTANT KUNDALINI RAISE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANT LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE BY PRAYING TO GOD.. A\nHINDU CULTIVATES SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK\nRELIGIONS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IS A POSTIVE ENERGY EMANATING FROM WITHIN WHICH\nFACTORS IN HUMAN CONSCIENCE.. THERE CANNOT BE SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA CANNOT BE BLIND FAITH, IT IS ENLIGHTENED FAITH\u2014\nSELF VERIFICATION IS INVOLVED IN EVERY INCH OF YOUR SPRIRITUAL PROGRESS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IMPIES SELF RELIANCE , AN INDEPENDENT SENSE OF\nRIGHT OR WRONG , RELIANCE ON OWN CONSCIENCE AND COURGAGE OF ONEs SOUL\nCONVICTIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS CAN NEVER RUSH OUT OF TEMPLES ENMASSE\nAFTER FRIDAY NOON PRAYERS AND START KILLING PEOPLE OF OTHER RELIGIONS ENMASSE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SANATANA DHARMA AFFORDS THIS UNBRIDLED FREEDOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA HINDU DOES NOT NEED TO BE SAVES BY ANY MESSIAH.. HE NEEDS\nNO ENTRY PERMISSION AT THE PEARLY GATES \u2013THERE IS NO HOUR OF JUDGEMENT . HIS\nSOUL IS SUBJECTED TO THE UNINERSAL LAWS OF QUANTUM PHYSICS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLIBERATION IS ONLY THOUGH KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSANATANA DHARMA ASKS YOU TO WAKE UP, OTHER RELIGIONS ASK YOU\nTO REPENT..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND\nSANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. BHAGWAD GITA WAS INJECTED WITH\nPOISON REPLACING SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANNOT GET INSTANT MOKSHA BY DIPPING IN GANGES . NO GURU\nCAN GIVE YOU DEEKSHA FOR MOKSHA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN A SON DOES SHRADDH FOR HIS DEAD FATHER , HE HELPS HIS\nFATHERs SOUL RISE BY ONE ASTRAL LAYER.. THIS IS A ONE TIME AFFAIR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA\u2014AND ONLY TO\nMEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWOMEN ( CANNOT BE DEVOID OF EGO ) WHOSE SOULS ARE PARKED IN\nTHE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER HAVE TO TAKE RE-BIRTH AS MAN TO GET MOKSHA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMIC BAGGAGE CAN BE LESSENED ONLY BY GOOD DEEDS AND BEING\nCREATIVE --SO THAT YOU PROVE THAT YOU MADE A DIFFERENCE TO THIS PLANET FOR THE\nBETTER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"SOUL\" GIVES PERPETUAL MOTION TO YOUR HEART . YOUR\nSOUL WAS ONCE PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD .. IT YEARNS TO MERGE BACK --IT YEARNS\nFOR MOKSHA ( HOME COMING )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU GET MOKSHA YOUR SOUL HAS MERGED WITH BRAHMAN (\nMOTHER FIELD ) AND YOU ARE NOW FREE FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL GIVES FEEDBACK TO BRAHMAN OF YOUR LIFEs\nEXPERIENCES-- BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS SOUL EVOLUTION.. THERE IS NOTHING LIKE DARWINs\nEVOLUTION FROM MONEKY TO MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS MIND IS TOO SHALLOW -- ONLY A MAD\nMAN CAN SAY THAT THE GIRAFFEs NECK BECAME LONGER BECAUSE LEAVES WENT HIGHER ON\nTREE BRANCHES.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIN THIS DNA AGE, OUR NCERT BOOKS EACH OUR KIDS IN SCHOOL\nABOUT DARWINs MISSING LINK..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBURN ALL SCHOOL AND COLLEGE TEXT BOOKS IN INDIA WHICH TEACH\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs EVOLUTION IN THIS DNA AGE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE DEMAND THAT THIS BE SUBSTITUTED BY INTELLIGENT DESIGN BY\nBRAHMAN\u2014THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE SOUL WHICH EVOLVES ( from lowest frequency of\nunicelled fungus to highest moksha human Jivan Mukt frequency ) ACCORDING TO\n400 CENTURY OLD VEDANTA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMA CONTROLS MOKSHA --WHICH MEANS YOUR SOUL GOES TO THE\n7TH ASTRAL LAYER -- AND YOU ARE NOW GOD YOURSELF AS YOU ( SOUL ) MATCHES THE\nMOTHER FIELDS HIGHEST FREQUENCY -NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN BACK ON PLANET\nEARTH<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt.
